metadata.dc:author: Solís Morán, C E
Molina Moguel, J L
metadata.dc:description: Some of the European countries have advocated the use of monocortical screw miniplates for osteosynthesis in the craniofacial areas and there are several advantages over the wired osteosynthesis. The advantages and different applications of the miniplates in maxillofacial surgery are presented.
metadata.dc:title: Uso actual de las miniplaces en cirugía maxilofacial. Revisión de la literatura.
[Current use of miniplates in maxillofacial surgery. Review of the literature].
